title: Bug 49235 - ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not expected class
description: Bug 49235 - ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<?> classSet is not expected class. The output is 'MySomeClass'.
OB: When running the code on Tomcat 7.0.0, the output is 'MySomeAnn'.
EB: I expect the output to be 'MySomeClass'. This behavior is not consistent with the Servlet 3.0 specification. In Glassfish 3.0, the code works fine and outputs 'MySomeClass'.
